td.content: s:a white male aged 31 ys presents with 6 days history of moderate wheezing associated with food intake, moderate lower abdominal pain, moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain and Cancer. Denies ever using tobacco he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 3 years o:Height 64 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:patient presents with moderate wheezing associated with food intake for about 3 days. he is a 31 year old white male educator. he drinks at least 4 beers a day he does not smoke o:Height 64 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Abdomen.

td.content: s:a male aged 32 years presents with moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain, moderate wheezing associated with food intake. he has history of moderate lower abdominal pain. o:Height 64 in, Weight 123 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Small Bowel, 5-HIAA, 24hr U, serotonin.
